goals__remit:
The German Plastics Packaging Industry Association IK is the voice of the manufacturers of plastics packaging and films acting on the German market and represents: 
- more than 300 member compnies 
- over 80 percent of the market 
- a branch with 4 Mio t annual production of plastics packaging and films 
- an industry with more than 14 billion Euros annual sales and over 90.000 employees 
IK plays a key role as a successful trade organization on national,European and international level
